AI驱动的发现公开了TNIK抑制作用作为抗衰老策略由Insilico医学研究人员领导的一项开创性研究揭示了TNIK抑制作用作为创新的抗衰老策略的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/ai-driven-discovery-unveils-tnik-inik-inikition-anas-ans-anti-aging-strategy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/ai-driven-discovery-unveils-unveils-tnik-inik-inibition-aas-anti-aving-strategy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15A04B18-B85F-4F69-97E6-A57FE0AEDADADB Sat, 22 Feb 2025 08:54:33 -0500 AI-driven discovery unveils TNIK inhibition as anti-aging strategy
研究发现如何治疗慢性非癌症疼痛缺乏共识慢性疼痛很复杂且难以治疗。处方阿片类止痛药已引起争议，但可能会对某些患者有所帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/study-finds-lack-of-consensus-consensus-on-how-to-to-to-to-chreat-chronic-non-cancer-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/20250222/study-finds-lack-of-consensus-consensus-on-how-to-to-to-to-chreat-chronic-non-non-cancer-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7CD4206-0C06-4A87-BDB1-72B2CA2864DA Sat, 22 Feb 2025 08:31:29 -0500 Study finds lack of consensus on how to treat chronic non-cancer pain
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究发现，paxlovid对接种疫苗的老年人没有显着好处根据新的UCLA领导的研究，Paxlovid并不能显着降低接种疫苗的老年人的住院和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/ucla-study-finds-no-no-simenfificant-benefit-benefit-of-paxlovid-for-ver-ver-ver-ver-vaccined-vaccined-vaccined noder-apts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/UCLA-study-finds-no-significant-benefit-of-paxlovid-for-vaccinated-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41143166-3A34-45CF-A475-E9971586DC44 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 23:54:10 -0500 UCLA study finds no significant benefit of paxlovid for vaccinated older adults
新的人类抗体显示出对埃博拉病毒治疗的希望La Jolla免疫学研究所（LJI）的科学家领导的新研究揭示了一种称为MAB 3A6的人类抗体的起作用，这可能被证明是埃博拉病毒疗法的重要组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/new-human-antibody-shows-promise-promise-for-ebola-virous-virus-wareatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/new-human-antibody-shows-promise-promise-for-ebola-virous-virus-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90877EDB-FAC4-4223-BACD-A7CF225F8751 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 23:47:00 -0500 New human antibody shows promise for Ebola virus treatment
与Insilico的Harbor Biomed Partners一起加速AI驱动的抗体发现Harbor Biomed（Hkex：02142，“公司”），这是一家全球生物制药公司，致力于针对免疫学和肿瘤学的新颖抗体疗法的发现，开发和商业化，以及Insilico医学（“ Insilico”） （AI）驱动生物技术公司今天宣布了一项战略合作，以加速发现和发展创新的治疗抗体，利用它们在抗体发现和人工智能中的技术优势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/harbour-bour-biomed-partners-with-insilico-to-insilico-to-accelerate-ai-power- pare- pareed-power-抗体 - 抗体discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/harbour-bior-partners-partners-with-insilico-to-insilico-to-accelerate-ai-power-power- peraper-pary-pare-partibody-andibody-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4DD70F5D-74B6-4457-B9B5-AA622C314702 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 23:37:00 -0500 Harbour BioMed partners with Insilico to accelerate AI-powered antibody discovery
在资金不足的控制计划中，非洲面临着霍乱危机的越来越多根据新的分析，气候变化和冲突促进了霍乱在非洲的复兴，根据新分析，由于慢性资金不足而削弱了促进霍乱的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/africa-faces-growing-cholera-cholera-crisis-mid-amid-under-under-undund-control-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/africa-faces-growing-cholera-cholera-crisis-crisis-amid-under-under-undund-control-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60ae1a29-9995-4713-94b7-5894b81dfe27 Fri, 21 Feb 2025 23:21:39 -0500 Africa faces growing cholera crisis amid underfunded control plans
研究将过多的屏幕时间与青少年的心理困扰联系起来根据一项发表的研究，他们每天花费三个多小时以上的久坐行为 - 包括玩视频游戏，阅读休闲或花费大量时间因屏幕分心 - 将来面临心理困扰的风险更高。青少年健康杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/study-links-excessive-screen-screen time to-psychology-distress-in-adecents.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/study-links-excessive-screen time to-to-psychology-distress-in-in-adecents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93A4D531-42ED-4657-9432-75D6B69062BF Fri, 21 Feb 2025 14:35:08 -0500 Study links excessive screen time to psychological distress in adolescents
医生说的患者的语言与较低的心血管疾病风险有关积极的患者关系是对健康生活的一种组成部分，对关系中常见语言的影响可以通过减少心血管疾病而产生的新研究，从而造福更长的寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/doctors-speaking-the-patients-patients-language-lange-to-lower-to-lower-cardiaseasease-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/doctors-speaking-the-patients-langue-langue-lange-to-lower-to-lower-cardiaseaseasease-disease-risk-ask.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5671A043-3F27-42D7-9D93-10AE378DF31B Fri, 21 Feb 2025 14:28:47 -0500 Doctors speaking the patient's language linked to lower cardiovascular disease risk
工程血管细胞在糖尿病治疗中增强胰岛移植成功在Weill Cornell Medicine研究者领导的一项临床前研究中，将工程化的人血管形成细胞添加到胰岛移植中，增强了产生胰岛素的细胞和逆转糖尿病的存活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/ deangineered-blood-vessel-celsel-cells-boost-islet-islet-transplant-transplant-success-cuccess-inccess-in-diabetes-wartment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/ deangineered-blood-vessel-celsel-cells-boost-islet-islet-transplant-transplant-success-uccescess-inccess-in-diabetes-wartment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3811A2B1-65A9-497A-9F98-76EAADE21EFD Fri, 21 Feb 2025 14:14:00 -0500 Engineered blood vessel cells boost islet transplant success in diabetes treatment
靶向mRNA疗法显示出愈合受损肺的希望根据宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的新研究，mRNA和新的脂质纳米颗粒的结合可以帮助治愈受损的肺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/targeted-mrna-therapy-shows-shows-promise-promise-for-healing-healing-dmainged-lungs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250221/targeted-mrna-therapy-shows-shows-promise-promise-for-healing-healing-dmaged-lungs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7828D12E-734F-404B-B2D8-CD9344906EEE Fri, 21 Feb 2025 14:09:13 -0500 Targeted mRNA therapy shows promise for healing damaged lungs
